SEARCH
Package wsp

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
wsp.User
wsp.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Admin extends User implements Serializable
The Admin class represents an superuser in the system. Admins have the ability to manage users, create researchers, and perform various administrative tasks.
See Also:
